title: Image Overlay on Hover
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create an image overlay effect on hover using CSS. This effect adds a stylish and professional touch to images, making them more engaging and interactive. By using pseudo-elements and transitions, we will create a smooth and visually appealing overlay that will enhance the user experience of any website.
